comment:
* @hide
     * Interface definition of a callback to be invoked when the volume behavior of an audio device
     * is updated.

methods.name: void onDeviceVolumeBehaviorChanged(@NonNull AudioDeviceAttributes device, @AudioManager.DeviceVolumeBehavior int volumeBehavior)
methods.comment:
* Called on the listener to indicate that the volume behavior of a device has changed.
         * @param device the audio device whose volume behavior changed
         * @param volumeBehavior the new volume behavior of the audio device

methodNames: void onDeviceVolumeBehaviorChanged(@NonNull AudioDeviceAttributes device, @AudioManager.DeviceVolumeBehavior int volumeBehavior)
